Frequently Asked Questions

How can I access free resources?

Simply browse the Course Archive and click on any course marked as "Free". You'll get instant access to download materials via Google Drive.

What's included in premium bundles?

Premium bundles include cheet sheets, solved exam papers (5+ years), and exclusive video explanations for complex topics.

Can I request a specific course?

Absolutely! Use the contact form below to request any course. I prioritize requests based on demand and my own expertise in the subject.

Do you offer tutoring services?

Yes. Contact me for availability.
